rules_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Frontier[/i] – If there are four or more land types among lands you control, instead search your library for a creature or land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: [i]An echo from Sigrid's past called her here, clawing towards the surface. It was time to find out why.[/i]
